title: All.The.Wrong.Reasons.2013.DVDRiP.X264-TASTE[rarbg]
description:
I didn't encode this or create the original torrent but I thought I'd add it here as the encode labelled "All.The.Wrong.Reasons.2013.DVDRip.XviD-EVO" isn't very good quality. I suspect it's a case of bad IVTC, but motion isn't smooth. This one's fine.


Video:
AVC,   , 826 Kbps 
720 x 394
23.976fps
x264, CRF19

Container:

The video quality is what you'd expect from an encode of an NTSC DVD
